title: Drawing, "Mountain Landscape on the Road to Mocho, Ecuador", June 16, 1857
markings:
Recto:  Stamped in ink, at lower left:  Lugt 457d
Verso:  Stamped in ink, at lower center:  Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Lila velvet reflection on one side whitish light / yellowish olive ( lightish) on the other direct light; and at bottom right:  On the road to Mocho / June 16th, 57.
description: Horizontal view of mountain peaks and clouds, probably including Chimborazo on the upper half of sheet with a line separating the bottom half which shows the same peaks from a lower standpoint.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mountain Landscape on the Road to Mocho, Ecuador", June 16, 1857.
June 16, 1857. Graphite on light brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-235.
